title: BONNE Definition & Meaning - Merriam-Webster
text: French, from feminine of bon 1771, in the meaning defined above “Bonne.” Merriam-Webster.com Dictionary, Merriam-Webster, https://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/bonne. Accessed 4 Feb. 2026.
